ActIndian Act
PrecisAuthority to (a) enter into a SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT with the METEPENAGIAG MI'KMAQ NATION for the purpose of resolving two specific claims relating to the wrongful alienation of some 64 acres of Red Bank Indian Reserve No. 7 and roughly 100 acres of Big Hole Indian Reserve No. 8 (the Hosford Lot), both located in New Brunswick, and (b) accept the Instrument of Absolute Surrender comtemplated therein.
